nodes.text: Star Wars Bubble Magnets is a hardcover children's activity book that invites readers to create their own Star Wars scenes using fifteen 3-D bubble magnets. The book includes three scenes and scenarios adapted from the young-reader stories The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure and Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure, previously published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press. Star Wars Bubble Magnets was written by Eliana Palucci and was released by Phidal Publishing, Inc. on May 1, 2018.

The book's three scenes include "Jedi Training," featuring Luke Skywalker and the Temple of Eedit on the planet Devaron; "Survival Mission," featuring Han Solo and Chewbacca on a Rebel Alliance mission to the planet Cyrkon; and "Space Battle," as Solo and Chewbacca escape the Galactic Empire with the aid of the residents of Cyrkon.
